## URouter.getCurrentPages() method

获取所有`EWindow窗口`<!-- -->中的当前页面，多页模式下可以存在多个`EWindow`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCurrentPages(): {
        pagename: string;
        store: UStore;
        pageComponent?: any;
    }[];
```
<b>Returns:</b>

{ pagename: string; store: [UStore](./vue-web.ustore.md)<!-- -->; pageComponent?: any; }\[\]
